title: The Story of Canberra
brief_description: A comprehensive survey of the events which led to federation and eventual selection of the Australian Capital Territory and Canberra as its capital city. Traces the history, landmarks, life of the people, and functions as the centre of the Australian Government Narrated by Roger Climpson.
